title: BEAUTIFUL UPDATED - Hardwood Floors - Kitchen - NO SECURITY DEP!!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302818813', 'Rent: $2,300 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Absolutely beautiful 1 bedroom in Allston - new hardwood floors, awesome open kitchen with new backspace -Beautiful tile in bathroom - Located near Mass Pike with easy access to Downtown Boston, Cambridge, Brookline  - Harvard Business School and Trader Joes nearby!', '    Available for September 1 - this unit wont last long!', 'Schedule your showing with Chris this week!', 'Contact: 860 - 309 - 8511   or   chrisp @ <URL>', 'Tram: B Sutherland Road (0.35 mi)', 'Bus: 57 Cambridge St @', 'Washington St (0.20 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Union St (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.12 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Snow St (0.11 mi)', '302818813', 'Christopher Puzacke', 'Licensed Real Estate Professional', '107 Brighton Ave Boston, MA 02134', 'Cell: 860.309.8511', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
